name: Woozy Quidzy Returns
description:
Space Gustav finally reached the Blumzy corp headquarters !

Help him save poor Quidzy from the rootless yet modern boss Augustine.

But beware ! Doctor Guchi s EVIL experiments roam the premises !

Quick ! Grab Quidzy and get outta there !!!

Controls : Left/Right arrow, [E] to interact

A little game made for the Trijam #123 Hide or get caught !

The goal was to made a game in 3h, here are our respective production time :

Miguel Prud’hom 5h30 : character design and animation, background

Fukuma Nausicaa 3h30 : character design and animation

Guibal Adrien 30min : Background

Konrad Banti 4h30 : dev on Unity

Freesound used :
